title: FS/FT: EPDG cards Hulswitt, Graham, Sharpe, Milligan
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FS/FT: EPDG cards Hulswitt, Graham, Sharpe, Milligan
posts.post_content:
Some more dupes available for sale or trade

Paypal F&F preferred. Buyer pays $2 shipping for 1 or 2 cards. 3 or more cards and shipping is on me.

As always, I'm open to offers, especially if buying more than 1.

If you want a better scan, shoot me a PM with your email address.

As for trades, looking for other EPDG's I need.  

$SOLD Bresnahan Portrait 
$55 Graham
$50 Hulswitt - One of the toughest commons with this back. I believe only 4 graded between PSA and SGC
$SOLD Keeler Portrait 
$195 Sharpe SGC 60
$100 Milligan SGC 40
